entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as the entity that Sirius did a deal with.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as the person who did a deal with the Ministry of Magic.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as the location where Sirius put other people in place of himself.

entities.name: dark arts
entities.description: The Dark Arts are mentioned as the subject that Karkaroff teaches to his students.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is mentioned as the person who teaches the Dark Arts and is also a champion of Durmstrang.

entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: Durmstrang is mentioned as Karkaroff's school.

entities.name: goblet
entities.description: The Goblet is mentioned as the object that Karkaroff supposedly put Harry's name in.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person whose name was allegedly put in the Goblet by Karkaroff.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is also mentioned as a location where Sirius put other people.

relationships.description: Sirius did a deal with the Ministry of Magic, according to the text.
Karkaroff teaches the Dark Arts, as mentioned in the text.
Karkaroff is a champion of Durmstrang, according to the text.
Karkaroff allegedly put Harry's name in the Goblet, as mentioned in the conversation.
